com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.handlers

Class SCUIXAPIMashupHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.handlers.SCUIXAPIMashupHandler

  • public class SCUIXAPIMashupHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    MashupHandlers help action classes in getting the data from the static element in mashup.xml and also in any data transformation or caching needed for the input and output processing in the action before the invoking the api via the SCUIXAPIMashup. SCUIXAPIMashupHandler facilitates namespace resolution using the element in the mashup.xml. rasrinivasan

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getInputNs(SCUIContext uiContext, java.lang.String mashupId)
      This method gets the input namespace for a given mashupId defined under the <APINamespace> element in the mashup.xml.
      static java.lang.String getOutputNs(SCUIContext uiContext, java.lang.String mashupId)
      This method gets the output namespace for a given mashupId defined under the <APINamespace> element in the mashup.xml.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputNs

        public static java.lang.String getInputNs(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                          java.lang.String mashupId)
        This method gets the input namespace for a given mashupId defined under the <APINamespace> element in the mashup.xml. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext mashupId is the unique id of the mashup of type String. String containing the inputNamespace.

      • getOutputNs

        public static java.lang.String getOutputNs(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                           java.lang.String mashupId)
        This method gets the output namespace for a given mashupId defined under the <APINamespace> element in the mashup.xml. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext mashupId is the unique id of the mashup of type String. String containing the outputNamespace.
